biotools.summary: A web service incorporating state of the art tools and workflows for the analysis of eDNA sequence data.  Dedicated tools available in A-GAME allow efficient analysis of pooled libraries and rapid identification of candidate genes, reducing sequencing costs and saving the need for laborious manual annotation.

bioschemas.name: A-GAME
